Comments_List: I saw a gradual improvement in my Akkadian skills and was able to familiarize myself to ancient literary features and perspectives.

I would recommend this course to other students who are interested in ancient people, their lives, and their worldviews. In particular, this course is a must-to-take for those who are ready to dive into ancient literature because you read ancient texts in Akkadian and go through all the delicacy and difficulty of those texts.
